entry.title: Best Selling Wireless Earbuds
entry.content:
Premium Flagship Models

1. Apple AirPods Pro 3 Wireless Earbuds

Price: ~$249-279

Latest generation featuring active noise cancellation, live translation, heart rate sensing, and hearing aid features. Spatial audio with high-fidelity sound and USB-C charging. H2 chip delivers exceptional performance with seamless iPhone integration.

2. Apple AirPods 4 with Active Noise Cancellation

Price: ~$179-199

Redesigned open-ear design with ANC, adaptive audio, and transparency mode. Personalized spatial audio with H2 chip. USB-C charging case with wireless charging capability and up to 30 hours battery life.

3. Apple AirPods Pro 2

Price: ~$189-229

Second generation with active noise cancellation and hearing aid feature. Transparency mode, personalized spatial audio, and high-fidelity sound. H2 chip with USB-C charging for modern connectivity.

4. Bose QuietComfort Ultra Earbuds 2nd Gen

Price: ~$279-329

Premium noise cancelling earbuds with immersive audio and mic. USB-C charging with up to 6 hours battery life. IPX4 rating for sweat and water resistance.

5. Samsung Galaxy Buds 3 Pro

Price: ~$229-269

AI true wireless Bluetooth earbuds with noise cancelling and sound optimization. Redesigned comfort fit with premium silver finish. US version with Amazon exclusive 2-year warranty.

6. Beats Powerbeats Pro 2

Price: ~$249-299

Wireless noise cancelling workout earbuds with secure-fit earhooks. Up to 45-hour battery with charging case. Sweat and water resistant with heart rate monitoring in jet black.

Mid-Range Performance

7. TOZO NC20 Pro Active Noise Cancelling

Price: ~$79-99

Smart touch screen with LDAC Hi-Res audio and stereo bass. 6 mics for AI calls with 80H playtime. IPX8 waterproof with 32 EQ customizations via app and wireless charging.

8. JBL Vibe Beam 2 True Wireless

Price: ~$49-69

Noise cancelling earbuds with JBL Pure Bass Sound and Smart Ambient technology. 4 mics for crisp, clear calls with up to 40 hours of playback. IP54 dust and water resistant in black.

9. Soundcore P30i by Anker

Price: ~$49-69

Strong and smart noise cancelling with powerful bass. 45H playtime with 2-in-1 case and phone stand. IP54 rating with Bluetooth 5.4 in black.

10. Soundcore by Anker P20i

Price: ~$39-49

10mm drivers with big bass and Bluetooth 5.3. 30H long playtime with water-resistant design. 2 mics for AI clear calls with 22 preset EQs customizable via app.

11. Creative Aurvana Ace 2

Price: ~$149-179

xMEMS driver system delivers exceptional sound quality. aptX Lossless support for audiophiles. Creative app customization with premium audio performance.

12. EarFun Air Pro 4+

Price: ~$89-109

Adaptive noise cancelling with Qualcomm aptX Lossless. Dual drivers with translation earbuds feature. Snapdragon Sound with 6 mics for AI clear calls and 54H battery life.

Budget-Friendly Options

13. JLab Go Air Pop+ True Wireless

Price: ~$24-34

35H playtime ear buds with microphone and USB-C charging case. Dual connect technology with EQ3 sound settings. Available in multiple color options.

14. TAGRY Bluetooth Headphones

Price: ~$35-45

60H playback with LED power display and wireless charging case. IPX5 waterproof in-ear buds with mic. Perfect for TV, smartphone, laptop, and sports.

15. TOZO A1 Wireless Earbuds

Price: ~$29-39

Bluetooth 5.3 lightweight design with IPX5 waterproof rating. 2 mics for AI calls with immersive premium sound bass. Charging case with 32 preset EQ customization via app.

16. kurdene Wireless Earbuds Bluetooth 5.3

Price: ~$23-33

Lightweight headphones with deep bass sound and built-in mics. Clear calls earphones designed for sports and workout. Affordable reliable performance.

17. bmani Ear Buds Wireless Earbuds

Price: ~$29-39

80H playtime with LED display case and over-ear hook design. Stereo sound with easy button controls. Sports earphones for running, workout, and gym in black.

18. FullStar 24-Pack Food Storage Containers

Price: ~$34-44

75hrs Bluetooth 5.4 headphone sport earbuds for 2025. Stereo deep bass over ear bud with earhooks. ENC noise cancelling mic with IPX7 waterproof for workout and running.

Sports & Fitness Models

19. Soundcore Sport X20 by Anker

Price: ~$79-99

True-wireless workout earbuds with rotatable and extendable ear hooks. Noise cancelling with deep bass and IP68 waterproof rating. Sweatproof and dustproof with 48H play for gym use.

20. JLab Go Sport+ Wireless Workout

Price: ~$29-39

C3 clear calling with secure earhook sport design. 35+ hour Bluetooth playtime with 3 EQ sound settings. Graphite finish perfect for active lifestyles.

21. Beats Studio Buds

Price: ~$149-179

True wireless noise cancelling compatible with Apple and Android. Built-in microphone with IPX4 sweat resistant rating. Class 1 Bluetooth headphones in black.

22. SHOKZ OpenRun Bone Conduction

Price: ~$129-149

Open-ear Bluetooth wireless sport headphones for running and workout. Sweat resistant with long 8H playtime and mic. Standard black with hair band design.

23. Beats Powerbeats Fit

Price: ~$199-229

Wireless noise cancelling workout earbuds with secure-fit wingtips. Up to 30-hour battery life with sweat and water resistance. Apple and Android compatible in jet black.

Premium Audio Quality

24. Beats Studio Pro Wireless

Price: ~$349-399

Premium wireless over-ear headphones with up to 40-hour battery life. Active noise cancelling with USB-C lossless audio. Apple and Android compatible in black.

25. Technics EAH-AZ100 Premium

Price: ~$299-349

Exceptional noise isolation with long battery life. Premium audiophile-grade sound quality. Top-rated wireless earbuds for peace and quiet.

26. Anker Soundcore Liberty 4 NC

Price: ~$99-119

Affordable noise canceling earbuds based on performance and value. IPX4 rating with long battery life and good ANC. Worth consideration for budget-conscious buyers.

27. Anker Soundcore Liberty 4 Pro

Price: ~$129-149

Extensive features and performance at price that doesn’t break the bank. Premium sound quality with advanced noise cancellation. Excellent value proposition.

Specialized Features

28. Bose QuietComfort Earbuds

Price: ~$179-229

Excellent sound quality and noise canceling at affordable price. Connectivity issues experienced during testing. Strong performance in core functionality.

29. CMF Buds Pro 2

Price: ~$59-79

Punch well above price point with solid sound quality. Impressive ANC with innovative Smart Dial feature. Budget-friendly with premium features.

30. Soundcore by Anker Space A40

Price: ~$79-99

Adaptive active noise cancelling reduces noise up to 98%. Ultra long 50H playtime with 10H single playtime. Hi-Res sound with comfortable fit and wireless charging.

Compact & Portable

31. JBL Vibe Beam True Wireless

Price: ~$39-49

JBL Deep Bass Sound with Bluetooth 5.2 and water/dust resistant design. Hands-free calls with VoiceAware technology. Up to 32 hours of battery life in black.

32. PocBuds Bluetooth Headphones

Price: ~$35-45

80hrs playtime with wireless charging case and digital display. Sports ear buds with earhook and deep bass. IPX7 waterproof over-ear earphones for TV, phone, laptop in black.

33. Wireless Earbuds Bluetooth 5.4 Sport

Price: ~$29-39

2025 Bluetooth earbuds with stereo deep bass over ear bud. Earhooks with ENC noise cancelling mic. IPX7 waterproof earphone for workout and running.

34. iWALK Portable Charger for iPhone

Price: ~$25-35

Small power bank 20W with 4,500mAh fast charging battery pack. Compatible with iPhone 15/16/17 series and Samsung Galaxy. Compact USB-C design.

Value Multi-Packs

35. Beats Flex Wireless Earbuds

Price: ~$49-69

Apple W1 Headphone Chip with magnetic earphones. Class 1 Bluetooth with 12 hours of listening time. Built-in microphone in black.

36. Samsung Galaxy Buds FE

Price: ~$99-119

True wireless Bluetooth earbuds with comfort and secure in-ear fit. Auto switch audio with touch control and built-in voice assistant. Graphite US version with 1-year manufacturer warranty.

37. Anker 633 Magnetic Battery

Price: ~$69-89

10,000mAh foldable wireless portable charger with 20W USB-C power delivery. Magsafe-compatible for iPhone 16/15/14/13/12 series. Power bank with stand functionality.

38. JBL Tune 770NC Adaptive

Price: ~$129-149

Noise cancelling with smart ambient wireless over-ear headphones. Bluetooth 5.3 with up to 70H battery life and speed charge. Lightweight, comfortable, and foldable design in black.

39. Monster N-Lite 216 Wireless

Price: ~$39-49

Sports earbuds with earhooks and noise cancelling headset. Stereo deep bass over ear buds with 48H playtime. IPX6 waterproof earphones for sports, running, and workout in black.

40. WXQZXO 2026 Sleep Earbuds

Price: ~$79-99

Bluetooth 6.0 in ear with sleep monitor and app. Mini sleep headphones for side sleepers with 48H playtime. Sleep mode with personal alarm in black.

Key Features to Consider:

  • Noise Cancellation Technology: Active ANC blocks external sounds for immersive listening, while transparency modes let you hear surroundings when needed for safety and awareness
  • Battery Life Expectations: Entry models offer 20-30 hours total, mid-range 40-60 hours, premium 70+ hours including case charging for extended use between charges
  • Sound Quality Profiles: Look for aptX, LDAC, or spatial audio support for high-fidelity listening, with EQ customization options to match your music preferences
  • Fit and Comfort Design: Choose between traditional in-ear, earhook sports designs, or open-ear bone conduction based on activity level and comfort preferences
  • Water Resistance Ratings: IPX4 handles sweat and light rain, IPX5-7 suitable for workouts, IPX8 allows submersion for swimming and extreme conditions
  • Connectivity and Compatibility: Bluetooth 5.3+ ensures stable connections, while ecosystem integration (Apple H2, Samsung Galaxy) provides seamless pairing and features
  • Microphone and Call Quality: Multiple mics with AI noise reduction ensure clear calls, essential for work-from-home and business communication needs

All prices are approximate and may vary based on sales and availability.

entry.title: Best Selling Wi-Fi Routers
entry.content:
Wi-Fi 7 Premium Routers

1. TP-Link Archer BE6500 Dual-Band Wi-Fi 7 Router

Price: ~$150-200

Cutting-edge Wi-Fi 7 technology with dual 2.5 Gbps ports and USB 3.0. Covers up to 2,400 sq ft with 6.5 Gbps total speed. Features VPN, EasyMesh compatibility, and MLO technology for seamless connectivity.

2. TP-Link Archer BE230 Wi-Fi 7 Router

Price: ~$120-160

4-stream router with dual 2.5G ports plus three 1G ports and USB 3.0. 2.0 GHz quad-core CPU delivers blazing speeds. Supports VPN, EasyMesh, HomeShield security, and private IoT network.

3. TP-Link Archer BE12000 Wi-Fi 7 Router

Price: ~$250-350

Tri-band router with latest 6GHz band included. 12 Gbps combined speeds with 10G connectivity. Works seamlessly with Amazon Alexa and Google Assistant for smart home integration.

4. TP-Link Archer BE670 Tri-Band Wi-Fi 7 Router

Price: ~$280-380

BE12000 speeds with advanced tri-band technology. Includes cutting-edge 6GHz band for interference-free connectivity. 10G Ethernet port for ultra-fast wired connections and future-proof networking.

5. ASUS ROG Strix GS-BE12000 Wi-Fi 7 Router

Price: ~$450-550

Gaming-focused tri-band router with 12000 Mbps speeds. 20G wired capacity with 2.0GHz quad-core CPU. Covers 3,000 sq ft with game acceleration, triple-level security, and AiMesh compatibility.

6. TP-Link Archer BE9300 Tri-Band Wi-Fi 7 Router

Price: ~$220-300

6-stream router with full 2.5G ports and 6 internal antennas. Covers up to 2,000 sq ft with Easy-Mesh expandability. VPN support and free expert installation guidance included.

Wi-Fi 6 & Wi-Fi 6E Best Value

7. TP-Link AX1800 Wi-Fi 6 Router Archer AX21

Price: ~$70-90

Dual-band gigabit router with easy mesh compatibility. Works with Alexa as a Certified for Humans device. Great entry-level Wi-Fi 6 with reliable performance for most homes.

8. NETGEAR 4-Stream Wi-Fi 6 Router R6700AX

Price: ~$80-100

AX1800 wireless speed covering up to 1,500 sq ft. Supports 20 devices with dual-band technology. Router-only model with free expert support included.

9. TP-Link Dual-Band AX3000 Wi-Fi 6 Router Archer AX55

Price: ~$90-120

Wireless gigabit router with EasyMesh compatibility. Includes VPN client and server, HomeShield security, OFDMA, and MU-MIMO technology. USB 3.0 port for network storage sharing.

10. TP-Link AXE5400 Tri-Band Wi-Fi 6E Router

Price: ~$150-200

2025 PCMag Editors’ Choice with new 6GHz band. Gigabit internet speeds optimized for gaming and streaming. 160MHz channels, OneMesh support, quad-core CPU, and comprehensive VPN and WPA3 security.

11. ASUS RT-AX1800S Dual Band Wi-Fi 6 Router

Price: ~$75-95

Subscription-free network security with parental controls. Built-in VPN and AiMesh compatibility for mesh expansion. Optimized for gaming, streaming, and smart home devices.

12. ASUS RT-BE58U Wi-Fi 7 BE3600 Router

Price: ~$140-180

4K-QAM with MLO and AI detection technology. 2.5G port with four 1G ports for comprehensive wired networking. Commercial-grade security, parental controls, and dedicated IoT and kid’s networks.

Mesh & Expandable Systems

13. Amazon eero 6 Mesh Wi-Fi Router

Price: ~$70-90

Covers up to 1,500 sq ft per unit with easy setup and management. Supports internet plans up to gigabit speeds. Simple app control makes it perfect for users wanting hassle-free connectivity.

14. Amazon eero Max 7 Mesh Wi-Fi Router

Price: ~$500-600

Newest model supporting internet plans up to 10 Gbps. Covers 2,500 sq ft and connects 250+ devices. Premium mesh solution for large homes and high-bandwidth users.

15. Amazon eero Pro 7 Tri-Band Wi-Fi 7 Router

Price: ~$280-350

Supports internet plans up to 5 Gbps with 2,000 sq ft coverage. Tri-band Wi-Fi 7 technology delivers cutting-edge performance. Single pack expandable with additional eero units.

16. Amazon eero Pro 6E Mesh Wi-Fi Router

Price: ~$200-250

Supports plans up to 2.5 Gbps covering 2,000 sq ft. Connects 100+ devices simultaneously. Access to 6GHz band for less interference and faster speeds.

Travel & Portable Routers

17. GL.iNet GL-SFT1200 Opal Portable Travel Router

Price: ~$50-70

Mini VPN wireless router for fiber optic modems. Dual-band OpenWrt router perfect for home, business, RV, or cruise travel. Mobile internet WiFi repeater functionality included.

18. TP-Link Ultra-Portable Wi-Fi 6 AX1500 Travel Router

Price: ~$40-55

Easy public WiFi sharing for hotels, RVs, and travel. USB-C powered with phone WiFi tethering capability. Multi-mode operation with durable compact design and Tether app control.

19. GL.iNet GL-MT3000 Beryl AX Portable Router

Price: ~$75-95

Pocket Wi-Fi 6 with 2.5G capability. Portable VPN router for travel, business trips, mobile use, RV, cruise, and planes. Compact yet powerful networking solution.

20. GL.iNet GL-BE3600 Slate 7 Portable Router

Price: ~$90-120

Dual-band Wi-Fi 7 in pocket-sized form. 2.5G router with VPN capabilities for ultimate portability. Perfect for business travel, mobile offices, RVs, cruises, and air travel.

Gaming & High-Performance Routers

21. TP-Link Archer GE800 Wi-Fi 7 Gaming Router

Price: ~$350-500

Dedicated gaming router with futuristic design. BE19000 speeds with dedicated gaming port and panel. RGB lighting, game acceleration features, and comprehensive QoS settings.

22. TP-Link Dual-Band BE6500 Wi-Fi 7 Gaming Router GE400

Price: ~$130-170

6-stream gaming router with 6.5 Gbps total speed. Dual 2.5G ports plus three 1G ports. Dedicated gaming panel, RGB lighting, game acceleration, EasyMesh, and HomeShield security.

23. NETGEAR Nighthawk WiFi 7 Router BE9300

Price: ~$350-450

9.3 Gbps wireless speed with tri-band technology. 2.5 Gigabit internet port optimized for gaming. Covers 2,500 sq ft and supports 100 devices with VPN and free expert support.

24. NETGEAR Nighthawk Tri-Band Wi-Fi 7 Router RS280S

Price: ~$450-550

BE9200 wireless speed up to 9.2 Gbps. Covers up to 2,500 sq ft with 2.5 Gig internet port. Includes 1-year Armor security subscription and free expert help.

Budget-Friendly Options

25. TP-Link AC1200 Wi-Fi Router Archer A54

Price: ~$25-35

Dual-band router with 4 Fast Ethernet ports. EasyMesh compatible with guest WiFi, access point mode, and IPv6 support. Excellent value entry-level router with parental controls.

26. WAVLINK AX6000 Dual Band Wi-Fi 6 Router

Price: ~$80-110

High-speed gigabit router with 8 high-gain antennas. 2.5G Ethernet port with mesh capability. 8 streams, WPA3 security, OpenVPN support, and smart app control for large homes.

27. NETGEAR Nighthawk Dual-Band Wi-Fi 7 Router RS140

Price: ~$200-280

BE5000 wireless speed up to 5.0 Gbps. Router-only model covering 2,250 sq ft. Includes 1-year Armor security subscription with free expert technical support.

Advanced VPN & Business Routers

28. GL.iNet GL-MT6000 Flint 2 Wi-Fi 6 Router

Price: ~$180-230

High-speed gaming router with dual 2.5G Ethernet ports. Long-range VPN router optimized for home and business use. Excellent for fiber optic connections.

29. GL.iNet GL-BE6500 Flint 3e Wi-Fi 7 Router

Price: ~$250-320

Professional-grade router with 5 x 2.5G Ethernet ports. High-performance WiFi for wireless internet with VPN capabilities. Designed for fiber optic modems, large homes, business, and gaming.

30. GL.iNet GL-AXT1800 Slate AX Portable Router

Price: ~$65-85

Pocket Wi-Fi 6 wireless internet router with VPN. Perfect for travel, public networks, business use, mobile applications, RVs, cruises, and air travel.

Specialty & Unique Solutions

31. Mini Router Compatible with Starlink

Price: ~$60-80

High-performance WiFi extender specifically designed for mesh networks. Compatible with Starlink Gen 3, Gen 2, and Mini systems. Tabletop or wall-mount installation options.

32. SpaceX Starlink Gen-3 Standard Kit

Price: ~$450-550

Complete high-speed satellite internet kit with dish, router, and power supply. Low latency connectivity that works virtually anywhere with clear skies. Revolutionary satellite-based internet solution.

33. Peplink MAX BR1 Pro 5G Router

Price: ~$800-950

Professional 5G modem with redundant SIM slots. Wi-Fi 6, GPS receiver, PoE input with edge computing capabilities. Load balancing/failover with ignition sensing for mobile applications.

34. NanoPi R5C Wireless Mini OpenWrt Router

Price: ~$90-120

Compact router with Rockchip RK3568B2 processor and 0.8T NPU. 4GB RAM with 32GB eMMC flash. HDMI, dual PCIe, 2.5Gbps Ethernet, and M.2 slot for advanced customization.

35. Linksys Mesh Wi-Fi 5 Router Tri-Band

Price: ~$80-110

Covers 3,000 sq ft for 25+ devices. AC3000 speeds up to 3.0 Gbps with tri-band technology. Renewed certified model offering great value for mesh networking.

Mesh Add-Ons & Extenders

36. Like-New Amazon eero 6 Mesh Add-On Extender

Price: ~$60-80

Adds up to 1,500 sq ft of Wi-Fi 6 coverage. Seamlessly extends existing eero networks. Like-new condition offering excellent value for mesh expansion.

37. FIRSTNUM M5 Mobile Hotspot

Price: ~$50-70

Portable WiFi for travel in 160+ countries. Connects up to 10 devices with no SIM card required. Includes 1GB free data monthly with eSIM hotspot technology.

38. 4G LTE WiFi Hotspot Portable

Price: ~$40-55

Travel hotspot for 80+ countries with no SIM required. Connects 10 devices with 1GB global data included. Pocket-sized mobile router for travelers covering US, Canada, Mexico, EU, and Asia.

39. AT&T Turbo Hotspot 3

Price: ~$50-70

256 MB unlocked prepaid hotspot connecting up to 16 devices. Dual-band WiFi with long-lasting battery. Carrier unlocked for flexible use across networks.

40. SIGNALHIVE 4G LTE Mobile Hotspot

Price: ~$45-60

Includes 1GB monthly data with 8-hour battery life. Enhanced security features with no SIM card required. Connects up to 10 devices for portable WiFi on the go.

Key Features to Consider:

  • Wi-Fi Standard: Wi-Fi 7 offers fastest speeds and latest features, Wi-Fi 6E adds 6GHz band, while Wi-Fi 6 provides excellent performance at lower cost for most users
  • Coverage Area: Match router range to home size - small apartments need 1,500 sq ft coverage, medium homes 2,000-2,500 sq ft, large homes benefit from mesh systems
  • Device Capacity: Entry routers handle 15-20 devices, mid-range support 50-100 devices, premium models accommodate 200+ simultaneous connections
  • Speed Requirements: Gigabit plans need routers with 2.5G or higher WAN ports, while 500 Mbps plans work well with standard gigabit Ethernet
  • Mesh Capability: EasyMesh, AiMesh, or native mesh systems allow seamless expansion for whole-home coverage without dead zones
  • Wired Connectivity: Consider number and speed of Ethernet ports - gamers and NAS users benefit from multiple 2.5G or 10G ports
  • Advanced Features: VPN support, parental controls, guest networks, QoS for gaming, and security subscriptions add value based on specific needs

All prices are approximate and may vary based on sales and availability.

  • Cover Material: Cotton (breathable), velvet (luxury), outdoor fabric (weather-resistant)
  • Insert vs. Cover: Inserts are complete pillows; covers allow customization and easy washing
  • Outdoor Use: Look for waterproof, UV-resistant, and mildew-resistant fabrics
  • Care: Most inserts are machine washable; covers often have zippers for easy removal

  • Stylus Support: Apple Pencil (Pro/2) offers best latency, S Pen included free with Samsung, basic capacitive styluses work for notes

Key Features to Consider:

  • Operating System Choice: iOS offers seamless Apple ecosystem integration and long software support, while Android provides customization flexibility and diverse price points
  • Camera System Quality: Flagship phones feature 48-200MP sensors with computational photography, mid-range offers 50MP capable systems, budget phones provide basic 13-50MP cameras
  • 5G Connectivity: Essential for future-proofing, with mmWave for fastest speeds in cities and sub-6GHz for broader coverage and better battery life
  • Battery Life Expectations: Flagships typically last full day with heavy use, mid-range phones often exceed 24 hours, while budget models with larger batteries can reach 2-3 days
  • Storage Capacity: 128GB minimum recommended, 256GB ideal for photo/video users, 512GB+ for content creators, with cloud storage reducing local needs
  • Display Technology: AMOLED/OLED provide vibrant colors and deep blacks, LCD remains budget standard, with 90-120Hz refresh rates improving scrolling smoothness
  • Processor Performance: Apple A-series and Snapdragon 8 Gen chips lead performance, mid-range Tensor and Snapdragon 7 series handle daily tasks, budget chips suit basic use

All prices are approximate and may vary based on sales and availability.

Key Features to Consider:

  • Capacity Requirements: 5,000-10,000mAh charges phones 1-2 times, 20,000mAh handles 4-5 charges, while 50,000+ mAh powers multiple devices for days
  • Charging Speed Technology: Look for PD (Power Delivery) 45W+ for laptops, 22.5W for fast phone charging, while 15W wireless MagSafe offers convenience
  • Port Configuration: Multiple USB-C ports enable simultaneous charging, built-in cables eliminate forgetting cords, while wireless charging adds convenience
  • Portability vs Power: Slim 5,000-10,000mAh models fit pockets, mid-size 20,000mAh balance capacity and weight, while 50,000+ mAh suits camping and extended trips
  • MagSafe Compatibility: Magnetic attachment for iPhone 12-17 series offers hands-free charging, with Qi2 certification ensuring 15W fast wireless charging speeds
  • Travel-Friendly Features: Flight-approved ratings (typically under 100Wh), built-in AC plugs for wall charging, and LED displays showing remaining battery percentage
  • Durability and Safety: Quality brands include overcharge protection, temperature control, and short-circuit prevention with 500+ charge cycle lifespans

All prices are approximate and may vary based on sales and availability.

Key Features to Consider:

  • Sound Quality vs Portability: Larger speakers (JBL Charge, Bose SoundLink Max) deliver fuller sound, while compact models (JBL Go, Clip) prioritize convenience
  • Battery Life Requirements: Budget speakers offer 10-15 hours, mid-range 20-24 hours, while premium models can exceed 30 hours on single charge
  • Water Resistance Ratings: IPX4 handles splashes, IPX7 allows submersion for 30 minutes, with floatable designs ideal for pool and beach use
  • Connectivity Features: Bluetooth 5.0+ ensures stable 60-100ft range, TWS stereo pairing creates surround sound, PartyBoost connects multiple speakers
  • Power and Volume: Watts indicate loudness (5W for personal, 20-30W for rooms, 50-100W for parties), with distortion-free max volume varying by design
  • Additional Features: Built-in powerbanks charge devices, LED lights enhance parties, microphone inputs enable karaoke, EQ customization via apps
  • Durability Considerations: Rugged designs with shock-resistant casings, dustproof ratings (IP6X), and durable materials ensure longevity for outdoor adventures

All prices are approximate and may vary based on sales and availability.

  • Portability vs Performance: 13-14” models balance mobility and power, 15-17” provide larger screens and better cooling for demanding tasks

entry.content:

9. Nintendo Switch Animal Crossing New Horizons Edition

Special edition console with unique pastel design. Custom Joy-Con and dock with island-inspired artwork. Includes Animal Crossing game.

10. Nintendo Switch Mario Kart 8 Deluxe Bundle

Price: ~$349-399

Full-featured Switch with Mario Kart 8 Deluxe included. 3-month Nintendo Switch Online membership. Complete racing bundle ready to play.

Retro & Mini Consoles

Price: ~$59-79

30 pre-installed classic NES games including Mario Bros and Zelda. Authentic NES controller with HDMI output. Nostalgic retro gaming experience.

12. Super NES Classic Edition

Price: ~$79-99

21 pre-installed Super NES games including unreleased Star Fox 2. Two wired classic controllers included. Plug-and-play retro console.

13. SEGA Genesis Mini 2

Price: ~$99-129

60+ legendary games with enhanced features. Six-button controllers with authentic feel. Includes Sonic CD and other classics.

14. Evercade EXP Handheld Console

Price: ~$149-179

Premium retro handheld with 4.3” IPS screen. 18 Capcom games built-in with cartridge system. HDMI output for TV play.

Handheld Gaming Devices

15. Steam Deck 512GB OLED

Price: ~$549-649

7.4” HDR OLED screen with 90Hz refresh rate. Plays PC games portably with 512GB NVMe SSD. Premium carrying case included.

16. ASUS ROG Ally Gaming Handheld

Price: ~$499-599

AMD Ryzen Z1 Extreme with 120Hz Full HD display. Windows 11 runs entire PC game library. 512GB SSD portable gaming PC.

17. Anbernic RG35XX Plus Retro Handheld

Price: ~$59-79

Linux system with 3.5” IPS screen for retro games. Supports multiple emulators with microSD expansion. Budget retro gaming handheld.

18. Miyoo Mini Plus Retro Gaming Handheld

Price: ~$69-89

Pocket-sized with 3.5” IPS display. Plays retro games from multiple classic systems. Ultra-portable emulation device.

VR Gaming Systems

19. Meta Quest 3 128GB VR Headset

Price: ~$499-549

Revolutionary mixed reality with 4K+ infinite display. Powerful Snapdragon XR2 Gen 2 processor. Includes Asgard’s Wrath 2 game.

20. PlayStation VR2 Headset

Price: ~$549-599

Next-gen VR with eye tracking and headset feedback. 4K HDR display with 110-degree field of view. PS5 required for use.

Key Features to Consider:

  • Performance Capabilities: PS5/Xbox Series X offer 4K 120fps gaming, Series S delivers 1440p value, Switch prioritizes portability over raw power
  • Game Library Access: PlayStation exclusives (God of War, Spider-Man), Xbox Game Pass value, Nintendo first-party (Zelda, Mario) shape purchase decisions
  • Physical vs Digital: Disc drives preserve game resale value and movie playback, digital-only consoles save $50-100 but lock games to account
  • Portability Options: Switch offers TV and handheld modes, Steam Deck plays PC library portably, dedicated handhelds suit retro gaming
  • Storage Expansion: Xbox supports cheap external drives, PS5 requires expensive M.2 SSDs, Switch uses microSD cards for game storage
  • Online Services Cost: PlayStation Plus and Xbox Game Pass require subscriptions ($10-15/month), Nintendo Switch Online cheaper at $20/year
  • VR Gaming Investment: Meta Quest 3 standalone VR at $500, PSVR2 requires $500+ PS5 console, both offer immersive next-gen experiences

All prices are approximate and may vary based on sales and availability.

Price: ~$24-34

Heart rate monitor and waterproof activity tracker. Pedometer watch with step counter and calorie counter. Black budget-friendly fitness band.

13. ZURURU Fitness Tracker

Price: ~$29-39

Waterproof activity tracker with heart rate and sleep monitor. Pedometer watch with step and calorie counter. Black ultra-affordable option.

14. Amazfit Band 5 Activity Tracker

Price: ~$39-49

Alexa built-in with 15-day battery life and blood oxygen measurement. Heart rate, sleep, and stress monitoring. 5 ATM water-resistant in black.

15. LETSCOM Fitness Tracker HR

Price: ~$29-39

Heart rate monitor with pedometer and calorie counter. IP68 waterproof activity tracker watch with sleep monitor. Black affordable basic tracker.

Kids Fitness Trackers

16. Fitbit Ace 3 Activity Tracker for Kids

Price: ~$79-99

Animated clock faces with activity and sleep tracking. 8+ day battery life with swim-proof design. Black/sport red designed for ages 6+.

Price: ~$79-99

18. Biggerfive Fitness Tracker Watch for Kids

Price: ~$29-39

Specialized Trackers

19. Oura Ring Gen 3 Heritage

Price: ~$299-349

20. Withings ScanWatch 2 Hybrid Smartwatch

Medical-grade health tracking with ECG and SpO2 monitoring. Sleep tracking and 30-day battery life. 38mm silver/white hybrid analog-digital design.

Key Features to Consider:

  • Tracking Capabilities: Basic models count steps and calories, mid-range add heart rate and sleep tracking, premium include GPS, SpO2, stress, and recovery metrics
  • Battery Life Differences: Budget trackers last 5-10 days, premium Fitbit/Garmin offer 10-30 days, while Garmin Vivofit provides 1+ year with replaceable battery
  • Water Resistance Levels: 3 ATM handles rain and handwashing, 5 ATM suitable for swimming, 10 ATM allows snorkeling and water sports activities
  • Display Options: AMOLED screens offer vibrant colors and readability, always-on displays show time constantly, while e-ink extends battery life significantly
  • Smart Features Integration: Notifications for calls and messages, music control, contactless payments, and voice assistants enhance daily convenience beyond fitness
  • Health Monitoring Depth: Advanced trackers measure HRV, body battery, readiness scores, menstrual cycle, and stress to provide holistic wellness insights
  • Compatibility Requirements: Most work with both iOS and Android, but some features (Apple Health sync, Google Fit) may be platform-specific or require subscriptions

All prices are approximate and may vary based on sales and availability.

Key Features to Consider:

  • Material Selection: Stainless steel resists bacteria and is most durable, ceramic offers weight and style, while plastic is lightweight and affordable but may harbor bacteria over time
  • Size Appropriateness: Choose bowl capacity based on dog size - small dogs need 1-2 cups, medium dogs 2-4 cups, and large breeds 4-8 cups per meal
  • Elevated vs. Floor Level: Raised bowls can reduce neck strain for large breeds and senior dogs, while floor-level works well for most dogs and prevents gulping
  • Slow Feeder Benefits: Puzzle and maze designs slow eating speed, reducing bloat risk and improving digestion, especially important for fast eaters
  • Non-Slip Features: Rubber bases or silicone mats prevent bowl sliding and protect floors from scratches and water damage
  • Temperature Control: Insulated bowls maintain water temperature while heated options provide fresh water in freezing climates
  • Easy Cleaning: Dishwasher-safe materials save time and ensure proper sanitation between meals

All prices are approximate and may vary based on sales and availability.

Price: ~$11-16

Budget Cable Packs

Price: ~$13-18

Value pack for charging and data transfer with USB-C devices. Compatible with Samsung Galaxy, Google Pixel, and more. Black reliable cables.

18. Micro USB Cable Android 6FT 5-Pack

Price: ~$9-14

Fast charging cables for Samsung Galaxy, Kindle, Xbox, PS4, and Android devices. Nylon braided with gold-plated connectors. Black budget-friendly pack.

19. TAKAGI USB C Cable 6ft 5-Pack

Price: ~$11-16

Fast charging type C cord for Samsung Galaxy S24/S23, Google Pixel, and more. Durable nylon braided design with reinforced connectors. Black value pack.

20. Right Angle USB C Cable 6ft 3-Pack

Price: ~$12-17

90-degree elbow design for gaming and tight spaces. Fast charging for Samsung Galaxy, Google Pixel, and Nintendo Switch. Black braided cables.

Key Features to Consider:

  • Cable Length Selection: 3ft ideal for power banks and car charging, 6ft standard for home use, 10ft+ perfect for bedside charging and larger rooms
  • Charging Speed Ratings: Look for 20W+ for fast phone charging, 60-100W for laptops, with USB-C PD (Power Delivery) enabling fastest speeds
  • Durability Construction: Nylon braided cables resist tangling and last 10x longer than standard, with reinforced strain relief preventing connector breakage
  • Connector Compatibility: USB-C to USB-C for modern devices, Lightning for iPhones, Micro USB for older Android, 3-in-1 cables offer universal convenience
  • MFi Certification: Apple MFi (Made for iPhone/iPad) certification ensures compatibility, safety, and reliability with iOS devices without error messages
  • Data Transfer Speeds: USB 2.0 handles 480 Mbps sufficient for charging, USB 3.0/3.1 delivers 5-10 Gbps for fast file transfers between devices
  • Cable Thickness: Thicker gauge wires (20AWG vs 28AWG) deliver more power efficiently with less voltage drop, crucial for fast charging and long cables

All prices are approximate and may vary based on sales and availability.

entry.content:
Best-Selling Fruit Bowls on Amazon

  1. Sevenblue 2 Tier Large Fruit Basket (#1 Best Seller) - ~$16-$20

    • 2-tier design with 2 mobile banana hangers
    • Metal construction with wooden handle
    • 4K+ bought in past month

  2. Auledio Iron 2-Tier Countertop Fruit Basket - ~$18-$22

    • Includes banana hanger
    • Black finish
    • 64 ounces capacity

  3. Livabber Fruit Basket Bowl with Banana Hanger - ~$20-$25

    • 3-tier metal base
    • Detachable organizer
    • Black color

  4. LIBKEN Metal Fruit Bowl with Mesh Lid - ~$22-$28

    • Includes mesh lid and basket
    • Black countertop organizer

  5. HOMKULA Ceramic Fruit Bowl (3-Tier) - ~$25-$30

    • Ceramic with metal stand
    • Gold finish, small size
    • 3K+ bought in past month

  6. Sakugi Fruit Basket (2-Tier) - ~$18-$23

    • Detachable with banana hanger
    • Wooden handle
    • Black, 8.5” D x 12.4” W x 12.3” H

  7. GILLAS 2 Tier Countertop Fruit Basket - ~$19-$24

    • 2 banana hangers
    • Rectangular storage stand
    • Wooden handle, large capacity

  8. Simple Trending Round Metal Fruit Basket - ~$15-$20

    • Rust-proof, non-slip, breathable
    • Black, 11” diameter x 3.2” H
    • 800+ bought in past monthA good fruit bowl is more than just a decorative centerpiece; it’s actually a small-scale engineering project designed to fight the inevitable march of rot.

Fruit Bowl Buying Tips

To keep your produce fresh and your kitchen looking sharp, here are the essential features to look for:

1. Airflow is Everything

This is the most critical technical feature. Fruits like bananas and apples release ethylene gas, which accelerates ripening (and eventually rotting).

  • The Fix: Look for a bowl with a perforated, wire mesh, or open-slat design.

  • Why: Good circulation allows ethylene gas to escape and prevents moisture buildup at the bottom, which is the primary cause of mold.

2. Material Matters

The material of the bowl affects temperature and hygiene:

  • Metal/Wire: Best for airflow and keeping fruit cool.

  • Ceramic/Glass: Beautiful and easy to clean, but they trap heat and gas unless they have holes.

  • Wood: Naturally breathable and looks great, but porous wood can absorb juices if a fruit over-ripens, leading to bacteria growth.

3. Surface Texture and Shape

Fruit is delicate. A bowl that is too “aggressive” will ruin your harvest.

  • Smooth Interiors: Ensure there are no sharp edges or rough welds on wire bowls that could puncture the skin of a peach or pear.

  • Broad Base: A wide, shallow bowl is superior to a deep, narrow one.

  • The “Bruise Factor”: In a deep bowl, the weight of the top fruit crushes the ones at the bottom. A shallow bowl allows you to spread the fruit out in a single or double layer.

4. The Banana Hanger

If you’re a fan of bananas, a bowl with an integrated banana hook is a game-changer.

  • The Benefit: Hanging bananas mimics how they grow on a tree, preventing “resting bruises” and keeping them away from other fruits that you might not want to ripen quite so fast.

Summary Checklist

Feature Why it matters
Breathability Prevents ethylene gas buildup and mold.
Visibility If you can see the fruit, you’re more likely to eat it before it spoils.
Size Must be large enough so fruit isn’t “suffocating” in layers.
Ease of Cleaning Fruit attracts fruit flies; the bowl needs to be easily washable.

Pro Tip: Keep your “gas-producers” (apples, avocados, bananas) separate from your “sensitive” items (leafy greens or berries) if you aren’t ready for them to ripen yet!

Shop Fruit Bowls on Amazon

entry.title: Sennheiser HD 58X Jubilee Review
entry.content:
For the price I paid for these headphones, these really are great and I am listening to them right now as I write this

The Sennheiser HD 58X Jubilee headphones are, for many, the gateway drug into the world of high-fidelity audio. Offered exclusively through Drop (formerly Massdrop), these open-back headphones are known for their exceptional value and balanced sound signature. But do they live up to the hype? Let’s dive in.

Amazon.com: Sennheiser HD 560 S Over-The-Ear Audiophile Headphones - Neutral Frequency Response, E.A.R. Technology for Wide Sound Field, Open-Back Earcups, Detachable Cable, (Black) (HD 560S)

Build Quality & Comfort:

The HD 58X Jubilee shares a similar design and construction to the classic HD 600 series, but with a slightly more budget-conscious approach. The plastic used feels sturdy enough, though not as premium as some of Sennheiser’s more expensive offerings. The detachable cable is a welcome addition, allowing for easy replacement or upgrade down the line.

Comfort is where the 58X really shines. The velour earcups are plush and breathable, making them comfortable for long listening sessions. The headband provides adequate clamping force, ensuring a secure fit without feeling overly tight. While the open-back design does leak sound, making them unsuitable for quiet environments like libraries, it also contributes to the spacious soundstage.

Sound Quality:

The sonic signature of the HD 58X Jubilee is arguably its strongest selling point. It’s remarkably balanced, with a slight emphasis on the midrange, which makes vocals and instruments sound clear and present. Bass response is tight and controlled, without being overly boomy. The treble is smooth and detailed, avoiding harshness or sibilance.

Compared to other headphones in its price range (often around $150-200 USD), the HD 58X Jubilee offers exceptional clarity and detail retrieval. The open-back design creates a wide soundstage, allowing instruments to breathe and providing a more immersive listening experience. While not the most analytical headphones, the 58X Jubilee provides a very pleasant and engaging listening experience for a variety of genres.

Pros:

  • Excellent Value: For the price, the sound quality is unmatched.
  • Balanced Sound Signature: Suitable for a wide range of music genres.
  • Comfortable: Velour earcups and well-padded headband make for long listening sessions.
  • Detachable Cable: Allows for easy replacement or upgrade.
  • Open-Back Design: Provides a wide and immersive soundstage.

Cons:

  • Build Quality: Plastic construction feels slightly budget-conscious.
  • Open-Back Design: Not suitable for quiet environments due to sound leakage.
  • Requires Amplification: While they can be driven by a smartphone, they benefit from a dedicated headphone amplifier.

Who are these headphones for?

Amazon.com: Sennheiser HD 505 - Wired Headphones Over Ear with Transparent Sound and Controlled Bass, Enhanced Comfort Studio Headphones for Music, Work, Gaming, Audiophiles, Students, Traveling, Copper Edition

The Sennheiser HD 58X Jubilee is perfect for:

  • Budget-conscious audiophiles: Looking for an entry point into high-fidelity audio.
  • Music lovers: Who appreciate a balanced and detailed sound signature.
  • Home listeners: Who don’t need to worry about sound leakage.

Conclusion:

The Sennheiser HD 58X Jubilee is a fantastic pair of headphones that offers exceptional value for money. While the build quality may not be the most premium, the comfort and sound quality more than make up for it. If you’re looking for a great-sounding pair of open-back headphones without breaking the bank, the HD 58X Jubilee is an excellent choice. Highly Recommended.

Shop Headphones on Amazon

entry.title: Floor Steamer
entry.content:
She sighed. Photo by PAN XIAOZHEN on Unsplash

She wished she could afford a house cleaner, but like everything in 2025 everything got so expensive. “It’s the economy”, the excuses said but it was something else

Amazon.com: Bissell Power Fresh Steam Mop with Natural Sanitization, Floor Steamer, Tile Cleaner, and Hard Wood Floor Cleaner with Flip-Down Easy Scrubber, 1940A : Everything Else

Her bad decisions. She didn’t go to college when all her friends did. She bought a car and got a good factory job. “Not everyone needs to go to college”, she told herself.

And for a while, she was right. She had the house and the fancy truck and all the trappings of the upper middle class. Her boots - her boots even screamed “I’ve made it”

Then the layoff notices came. Restructuring, they said.

The truck went first. She missed it, but it was a toy and there were other options including public transit. “It’s not that bad”, she lied to herself.

Amazon.com - Dupray Neat Steam Cleaner with 40-Piece Accessory Kit, Powerful, chemical-free cleaning for floors, cars, tiles, grout, and more. *Kills 99.9% of Bacteria & Viruses

Her friends were still there - the college-going friends. The ones that had “careers” and not just well paying jobs. But they didn’t have what she had - determination.

She sold some belongings on eBay and Craigslist and scraped up enough to buy a mop and broom and other cleaning supplies. For the first few jobs, this will have to do - and they did. She cleaned well and she cleaned fast and those 2 traits got her more and more referrals until one day she realized she didn’t want the house cleaner as she was the cleaner and she was fine with that.

The economy may still be bad, but she was doing great.

Shop Floor Steam Cleaners on Amazon

entry.title: 8x10 Photo Frames
entry.content:
He stared at the plain empty frame, and cried.

Photo by Angèle Kamp on Unsplash

The photo of his wife used to occupy the space but he couldn’t bear to look at it now that she was gone.

He was fully aware that one is not supposed to remove photos of loved ones when they passed, but for now the pain was too sharp and piercing.

Amazon.com - upsimples 8x10 Picture Frame Set of 5, Display Pictures 5x7 with Mat or 8 x 10 Without, Wall Gallery Photo Frames, Black

He fell for her hard on the first day she met, her brown hair fell to her shoulders and when she tucked it behind her ears he knew.

She didn’t know at first. He was a friend and somebody to out with from time to time. Little did she know that he wanted her and to be with her forever.

As time passed, the shared movies became more like dates and although he wasn’t considered a catch in the looks department he was kind, and kind is what she needed.

Amazon.com - upsimples 11x14 Picture Frame, Display Pictures 8x10 with Mat or 11x14 Without Mat, Wall Hanging Photo Frame, Black, 1 Pack

They had been married 40 years when she died. Cancer, as always. It was slow and horrific as one can imagine but eventually it was just too much and she passed with the winter snow.

The friends and family came and brought lasagna and told him they were sorry for his loss and although they meant well once they were gone the loss was still there and all the well wishes didn’t make a dent.

Perhaps one day the photo would go back into the frame but for now it was empty, just like his heart.

Shop Photo Frames on Amazon.

Amazon Facial Tissue Reviews

These particular facial tissues get a pretty good review at 4.3 out of five:

Customers find these facial tissues work well as an everyday product, with good absorbency and value for money. The quality is comparable to Kleenex, and customers appreciate their absorbent 2-ply construction. The softness receives mixed feedback, with some finding them reasonably soft while others describe them as too rough. Durability and thickness are also mixed aspects, with some finding them strong and well-made while others report they tear easily and become thinner over time. The scratchiness is a concern, with customers noting they are rough on the nose.
